abstract: As most large company do, MF Global bought insurance to pay for the expenses its employees might incur if they were investigated and found liable for actions taken while working for the firm. As unfair as it may seem, it is the company insurance that pays these legal costs, even in bankruptcy.

headline.main: Footing the Bill for MF Global's Lawyers
